text: Thomas the Archdeacon was a Roman Catholic cleric, historian and chronicler. He was born in 1200 and died in 1268. Thomas is considered one of the greatest sources in the historiography of Croatian lands.Radoslav Katičić: "Toma Arhiđakon i njegovo djelo" in Toma Arhiđakon: Historia Salonitana, Split, 2007. == References == Category:1200 births Category:1268 deaths
title: Thomas the Archdeacon
